introduction: The story follows Nellie, a stifled city girl who has never traveled outside her home town, as she discovers Ben, a mysterious nomad with a bizarre condition that rips them inexplicably across every corner of the earth. Every day is a fight for survival in the harshest and most beautiful environments on earth. As they travel, they grow closer to each other, while the strange forces of Ben's condition seek to rip them apart. Filmed entirely on location with no green screen, no sets, and no cinema lights, featuring mostly non-actors including real indigenous African tribes and local talent from 12 nations. Locations span a record-breaking 20+ countries across all 7 continents.
